column1: Master of Science in Applied Accounting and Finance (MScAAF)
column5: The MSc in Applied Accounting and Finance (MScAAF) is a master's degree programme in Hong Kong that integrates applied knowledge and skills in accounting and finance to train professionals who will be at home in both fields. The programme emphasizes real, practical international cases. Students acquire an in-depth understanding of and updated knowledge in both accounting and finance. This makes the programme suitable not only for accounting and finance professionals, but also for managers and executives in other business areas.Programme ThemeEnhance and Broaden Knowledge in Professional Accountancy and Finance
